summary: Power of Dragon Punch of Fire.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Requirements-[/size]
Dragonborn

[size=2][size=2][size=3]Power You Get-[/size]
Fire Punches burn them all

[size=3]Installation-
[/size]Place the file in data folder.

[size=3]How to Get this Ability-
[/size]Find spell tome in chest at any dragon lair location.
OR
use console(~) and type
player.addspell xx000d67
where xx is your load order
[size=3]
Uninstall-[/size]
Delete Dragon Fire Punch.esp from data folder[/size][/size]
author: Anmol
